company.title: Yannis ATTARD
company.description: I'm a gameplay programer student at CNAM-ENJMIN, France. I use Unity and Unreal Engine. I love to work with a team, I aim to make my projects a beautiful road of social encounters and a great human experience. I love to code gameplay, and I also like to participate on other game making aspects, such as game design or team organisation.

history.text: Little seeds is a three month student project. It's a relaxing VR game wich take place in a dreamed garden. It was done on Unreal Engine 4.16. I made a live growing tree algorithm, using the fresh new procedural mesh library on UE4. As a programer, I also work on optimisation, VR usability, tree generation. Outside of my programer work, I did some game design, and I organized the last sprint of the team.

award.description: Honorable mention for the video game student category at the "Pixel Challenge"
award.info: We won the second place of the Pixel Challenge, a game jam in Quebec City. I was the only programer in a team of five people. We did the game in Unity. The game was rewarded for its "great originality" and "craziness". We're kinda proud about it.
